item.title: Use OVH as a DNS-01 provider for cert-manager
item.description: Introduction First article of this new blog! Today we will discuss how to configure automatic Letâ€™s-Encrypt certificate renewal with a domain hosted in OVH. I have not found a clear tutorial on how to setup a cluster wide OVH cert-manager provider so there it is. Installation Cert-manager installation Quick reminder, installing cert-manager is pretty straightforward with Helm. Don’t forget to replace the version with the latest one : https://github.com/jetstack/cert-manager/releases kubectl create namespace cert-manager helm repo add jetstack https://charts.
